## Database Schema Requirements Analysis

Based on stakeholder requirements, the following core database entities have been identified:

1. **Users**: Authentication profiles with email, personal info, GDPR compliance fields, and session management.

2. **Creators**: Content creator profiles with platform URLs, auto-populated details, activity tracking, and status monitoring.

3. **Content**: Multi-platform content items with metadata, content body, AI summaries, and processing status.

4. **Topics**: Categorization system with hierarchy support, usage analytics, and CRUD operations.

5. **Creator URLs**: Platform links with validation status, normalization, and health monitoring.

6. **Saved Content**: User bookmarks with cross-device synchronization and filtering.

7. **Email Digests**: Notification system with delivery preferences and topic control.

8. **Junction Tables**: Many-to-many relationship tables for users-topics, creators-topics, and users-saved content.

9. **System Tables**: Operational tables for content processing, API usage, sessions, and platform health.

Technical requirements include support for 10,000+ concurrent users, 1M+ content items with sub-second search, multi-platform ingestion, real-time updates via WebSocket, full-text search, GDPR compliance, and rate limiting.

### RLS Testing Limitation Discovery
**Critical Finding**: The Supabase Management API (`mcp_supabase-saasrise_execute_sql`) executes all queries as the 'postgres' superuser, which **bypasses all Row Level Security (RLS) policies**. This means direct SQL testing through this API cannot validate actual RLS enforcement behavior.

2. **Policy Bypass**: RLS policies are designed to restrict non-superuser access
3. **False Validation**: Tests would always pass regardless of policy correctness
4. **Security Gap**: Cannot detect RLS policy misconfigurations or vulnerabilities

tasks.details: Use OpenAI or Anthropic API for summarization. Implement fallback to local models if needed. Cache summaries and version them for performance. Add summary quality scoring and feedback mechanisms. Use Supabase Edge Functions for serverless summarization endpoints.
tasks.testStrategy: Test summarization on sample content. Verify caching, versioning, and fallback logic. Check feedback and quality scoring.

subtasks.title: Integrate LLM API
subtasks.description: Establish a robust integration with the primary LLM API, ensuring secure authentication, request/response handling, and error management.
subtasks.details: Implement API client logic, handle rate limits, and ensure compliance with provider requirements. Prepare for modular expansion to support additional models or providers. Before implementation, use Context7 MCP to get the latest documentation and best practices.

subtasks.title: Implement Fallback Model Logic
subtasks.description: Develop a fallback mechanism to automatically route requests to an alternative LLM or model when the primary API fails or underperforms.
subtasks.details: Design logic to detect failures or quality issues and trigger fallback. Ensure seamless switching and consistent output formatting between models.

subtasks.title: Add Caching and Versioning Layer
subtasks.description: Introduce a caching system to store and retrieve previous LLM responses, and implement versioning to manage model and API changes.
subtasks.details: Optimize for latency and cost by caching frequent queries. Track model versions and API changes to ensure reproducibility and traceability of outputs.

subtasks.title: Integrate Quality Scoring Module
subtasks.description: Develop or integrate a module to automatically assess and score the quality of LLM outputs for each request.
subtasks.details: Use metrics such as ROUGE-L, BLEU, or custom heuristics to evaluate output quality. Feed scores into fallback logic and feedback mechanisms.

subtasks.title: Implement Feedback Mechanism
subtasks.description: Create a system for collecting user or automated feedback on LLM responses to inform continuous improvement and retraining.
subtasks.details: Enable users or automated agents to rate, comment, or flag outputs. Store feedback for analysis and use it to refine quality scoring and fallback strategies.

tasks.title: Build Dashboard Feed Interface
tasks.description: Develop the main content feed and filtering interface.
tasks.details: Create a chronological feed with infinite scroll and real-time updates via WebSocket. Implement mobile-responsive design with touch-friendly interactions. Use React Query for data fetching and state management. Optimize for performance with skeleton loading and image optimization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test feed loading, infinite scroll, and real-time updates. Verify mobile responsiveness and touch interactions. Check performance metrics.

subtasks.title: Design Feed UI Layout with Mobile Responsiveness
subtasks.description: Create the foundational feed interface, ensuring it adapts seamlessly to various screen sizes and devices for optimal mobile responsiveness.
subtasks.details: Use responsive CSS frameworks or media queries to ensure the feed layout works well on both desktop and mobile devices. Prioritize touch-friendly interactions and test across common device breakpoints.

subtasks.title: Implement Infinite Scroll Functionality
subtasks.description: Integrate infinite scrolling to dynamically load more feed items as the user scrolls, enhancing user experience and reducing initial load times.
subtasks.details: Utilize React hooks and libraries such as Intersection Observer or custom scroll event handlers. Ensure smooth loading of additional content and consider adding a 'scroll to top' button for usability.[1][3]

subtasks.title: Integrate React Query for Data Fetching and Caching
subtasks.description: Set up React Query to manage server-side data fetching, caching, and pagination for the feed, supporting infinite scroll requirements.
subtasks.details: Use React Query's useInfiniteQuery hook to handle paginated data fetching, background refetching, and cache management for efficient and scalable data handling.[2][4] Before implementation, use Context7 MCP to get the latest documentation and best practices.

subtasks.title: Add WebSocket Real-Time Updates
subtasks.description: Enable real-time updates in the feed by integrating WebSocket connections, allowing new items or changes to appear instantly.
subtasks.details: Establish a WebSocket connection to listen for updates from the server. Merge incoming real-time data into the existing feed, ensuring consistency with React Query's cache.

subtasks.title: Optimize Feed Performance
subtasks.description: Apply performance optimizations to ensure smooth scrolling, fast rendering, and efficient resource usage, especially with large datasets.
subtasks.details: Implement techniques such as virtualization (e.g., react-window), memoization, and selective rendering. Monitor and minimize unnecessary re-renders and memory usage.[3]

subtasks.title: Develop Comprehensive Testing Suite
subtasks.description: Create and execute tests covering UI responsiveness, infinite scroll, real-time updates, and performance to ensure reliability and maintainability.
subtasks.details: Write unit, integration, and end-to-end tests using tools like Jest and React Testing Library. Test edge cases such as rapid scrolling, network failures, and real-time data races.

subtasks.title: Virtual Scrolling Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement virtual scrolling for performance optimization with large datasets
subtasks.details: Set up virtual scrolling library, implement viewport management, handle dynamic item heights, optimize rendering performance for thousands of items

subtasks.title: Pagination and Data Loading
subtasks.description: Implement pagination logic and progressive data loading for infinite scroll
subtasks.details: Implement cursor-based pagination, handle loading states, implement scroll position persistence, optimize data fetching and caching

subtasks.title: WebSocket Connection Management
subtasks.description: Implement WebSocket connection management with reconnection logic
subtasks.details: Set up WebSocket connections, implement connection health monitoring, handle reconnection on failures, implement heartbeat and keep-alive mechanisms

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Filtering and Search
tasks.description: Develop advanced filtering and full-text search capabilities.
tasks.details: Build multi-select filtering by platform, creator, topic, and date range. Support saved filter presets and AND/OR logic. Implement full-text search using PostgreSQL with ranking and relevance scoring. Add search suggestions and history. Use Supabase for search queries and indexing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test filtering combinations and persistence. Verify search results, ranking, and suggestions. Check search history and empty states.

subtasks.title: Design and Implement Multi-Select Filter Backend
subtasks.description: Develop backend logic and data models to support multi-select filters, ensuring efficient querying and scalability.
subtasks.details: Define filterable fields, update database schemas if needed, and implement API endpoints to handle multiple simultaneous filter selections.

subtasks.title: Integrate AND/OR Logic for Filter Combinations
subtasks.description: Enable advanced filter logic (AND/OR) in the backend to allow users to combine multiple filter criteria flexibly.
subtasks.details: Update query builders and API endpoints to interpret and process AND/OR logic between selected filters, ensuring correct results.

subtasks.title: Implement Saved Presets Functionality
subtasks.description: Allow users to save, retrieve, and manage sets of filter and search configurations as reusable presets.
subtasks.details: Design data structures for storing user presets, create API endpoints for CRUD operations, and ensure security and privacy of user data.

subtasks.title: Develop Full-Text Search Engine Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate a full-text search engine (e.g., Elasticsearch) to support fast and relevant search across all indexed content.
subtasks.details: Index relevant data, configure analyzers for language support, and expose search APIs that work seamlessly with filters and logic. Before implementation, use Supabase MCP to check project configuration and apply necessary setup.

subtasks.title: Build Search Suggestions and History UI/Backend
subtasks.description: Implement frontend and backend components for real-time search suggestions and user search history tracking.
subtasks.details: Capture user queries, provide autocomplete suggestions based on indexed data and history, and ensure privacy controls for user search data.

tasks.title: Develop Creator and Topic Pages
tasks.description: Build dedicated pages for creators and topics.
tasks.details: Create creator profile pages with bio, statistics, and activity timeline. Build topic overview pages with creator lists and content statistics. Implement follow/unfollow and subscription management. Use React Router for navigation and dynamic routing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test creator and topic page rendering. Verify statistics, timeline, and subscription management. Check navigation and dynamic routing.

subtasks.title: Creator Profile Page Development
subtasks.description: Design and implement the creator profile page, including user information display, profile picture, bio, and relevant stats.
subtasks.details: Create UI components for profile, fetch and display creator data, handle responsive design.

subtasks.title: Topic Overview Page Development
subtasks.description: Develop the topic overview page to display curated content, featured creators, and topic-related information.
subtasks.details: Design layout, fetch and render topic data, implement content filtering and sorting.

subtasks.title: Follow/Unfollow Feature Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement functionality for users to follow or unfollow creators, including UI updates and backend integration.
subtasks.details: Add follow/unfollow buttons, handle state changes, update user profile and backend subscription status.

subtasks.title: Dynamic Routing Implementation
subtasks.description: Set up dynamic routing to allow navigation between creator profiles and topic pages based on user input or application state.
subtasks.details: Configure routing logic, handle dynamic URL parameters, ensure seamless navigation and content updates without full page reloads[1][3][5].

tasks.title: Implement Saved Content Management
tasks.description: Develop the ability to save and manage bookmarked content.
tasks.details: Add bookmark functionality to content cards. Implement saved content filter and persistence across sessions/devices. Use Supabase for storage and synchronization. Support combining saved content filter with other filters.
tasks.testStrategy: Test bookmarking, saved content filter, and persistence. Verify synchronization across devices. Check filter combinations.

subtasks.title: Implement Bookmark Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the core feature allowing users to bookmark content within the application. This includes UI elements for adding/removing bookmarks and managing bookmark states.
subtasks.details: Ensure that users can easily mark and unmark items as bookmarks. Design the data structure to store bookmark information efficiently. Before implementation, use Supabase MCP to check project configuration and apply necessary setup.

subtasks.title: Enable Saved Content Filtering
subtasks.description: Create filtering mechanisms so users can view only their bookmarked or saved content. Integrate these filters into the main content browsing experience.
subtasks.details: Implement UI controls and backend logic to filter and display only bookmarked items, supporting various content types as needed.

subtasks.title: Ensure Persistence Across Sessions
subtasks.description: Implement persistent storage for bookmarks so that user selections are retained between sessions, using local storage or a database as appropriate.
subtasks.details: Design and implement mechanisms to save and retrieve bookmark data reliably, ensuring state is restored when users return.

subtasks.title: Implement Synchronization Across Devices
subtasks.description: Develop synchronization logic to keep bookmarks consistent across multiple devices for the same user, handling conflicts and updates.
subtasks.details: Integrate with user authentication and cloud storage or backend services to sync bookmark data, ensuring real-time or near-real-time consistency.

tasks.title: Build Email Digest System
tasks.description: Develop the automated email digest delivery system.
tasks.details: Set up daily email delivery at 8:00 AM in user's timezone. Use Resend or SendGrid for transactional emails. Build responsive email templates with topic-based grouping and content prioritization. Implement digest preference management and preview functionality. Use Supabase for scheduling and content selection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test email delivery timing and content. Verify topic grouping and prioritization. Check preference management and preview.

subtasks.title: Email Scheduling Setup
subtasks.description: Develop and implement the logic and infrastructure for scheduling emails to be sent at specified times or intervals.
subtasks.details: This includes creating scheduling algorithms, integrating with time-based triggers, and ensuring reliability across different time zones. Before implementation, use Context7 MCP to get the latest documentation and best practices.

subtasks.title: Template Design and Management
subtasks.description: Design reusable and customizable email templates that support dynamic content and branding consistency.
subtasks.details: Establish a template system with guidelines for HTML email development, ensuring compatibility across email clients and devices.

subtasks.title: Topic Grouping and Categorization
subtasks.description: Organize email topics into logical groups to facilitate targeted messaging and user segmentation.
subtasks.details: Define topic categories, tagging mechanisms, and rules for associating content with specific groups for personalized delivery.

subtasks.title: User Preference Management
subtasks.description: Implement systems for users to manage their email preferences, including topic subscriptions, frequency, and format.
subtasks.details: Build interfaces and backend logic for users to set, update, and store their preferences securely, ensuring compliance with privacy standards.

subtasks.title: Email Delivery Testing
subtasks.description: Test the end-to-end email delivery process to ensure correct scheduling, template rendering, topic targeting, and respect for user preferences.
subtasks.details: Conduct automated and manual tests for deliverability, rendering across clients, and adherence to user settings, addressing any issues found.

tasks.title: Implement Topic Management System
tasks.description: Develop the topic management interface and backend logic.
tasks.details: Build CRUD operations for topics with merge/split functionality. Add topic usage analytics and bulk operations. Use Supabase for storage and analytics. Implement UI for topic creation, editing, and deletion.
tasks.testStrategy: Test topic CRUD, merge/split, and analytics. Verify bulk operations and UI feedback.

subtasks.title: Implement CRUD Operations for Topics
subtasks.description: Develop backend and frontend logic to support Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations for managing topics.
subtasks.details: Ensure data validation, secure access, and proper error handling for each operation. Design database schema and API endpoints as needed. Before implementation, use Supabase MCP to check project configuration and apply necessary setup.

subtasks.title: Develop Merge and Split Functionality
subtasks.description: Enable users to merge multiple topics into one or split a topic into several distinct topics.
subtasks.details: Design UI workflows and backend logic to handle merging and splitting, including conflict resolution and data integrity checks.

subtasks.title: Integrate Analytics for Topic Management
subtasks.description: Add analytics tracking and reporting to monitor topic usage, CRUD activity, and merge/split operations.
subtasks.details: Implement event logging, dashboard components, and data visualization for actionable insights.

subtasks.title: Implement Bulk Operations
subtasks.description: Allow users to perform batch actions (e.g., bulk delete, update, merge) on multiple topics simultaneously.
subtasks.details: Design efficient backend endpoints and intuitive UI controls for selecting and acting on multiple topics at once.

subtasks.title: Enhance UI with Real-Time Feedback
subtasks.description: Provide immediate, clear feedback to users for all operations, including success, error, and progress states.
subtasks.details: Implement notifications, inline validation, loading indicators, and accessibility improvements for a responsive user experience.

tasks.title: Implement Rate Limiting and Usage Controls
tasks.description: Develop rate limiting and usage control mechanisms.
tasks.details: Set creator addition limits (10/day/user for free tier). Implement API usage tracking and quota management. Add anti-abuse mechanisms for content scraping. Build usage analytics and reporting dashboard. Use Redis for rate limiting and Supabase for analytics.
tasks.testStrategy: Test rate limiting and quota enforcement. Verify anti-abuse and analytics reporting.

subtasks.title: Creator Addition Limits
subtasks.description: Implement limits on creator additions to prevent abuse.
subtasks.details: Develop a system to track and limit the number of creators that can be added within a certain timeframe.

subtasks.title: API Usage Tracking
subtasks.description: Monitor and track API usage to enforce rate limits.
subtasks.details: Set up a system to monitor API requests and track usage patterns.

subtasks.title: Anti-Abuse Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Develop mechanisms to prevent API abuse, such as rate limiting algorithms.
subtasks.details: Implement algorithms like fixed window, sliding window, or token bucket to prevent abuse.

subtasks.title: Analytics Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create a dashboard to visualize API usage and abuse trends.
subtasks.details: Design a dashboard to display API usage patterns, rate limit hits, and abuse attempts.

subtasks.title: Redis Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate Redis for distributed rate limiting and data storage.
subtasks.details: Use Redis to store and manage rate limit counters across distributed systems. Before implementation, use Context7 MCP to get the latest documentation and best practices.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance and Cross-Browser Compatibility
tasks.description: Optimize platform performance and ensure cross-browser compatibility.
tasks.details: Optimize initial page load (<2s), critical rendering path, and JavaScript bundles. Use CDN for images and static assets. Implement responsive design and accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA). Test on Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge, iOS, and Android. Use Lighthouse and browser dev tools for profiling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test page load times and rendering performance. Verify cross-browser functionality and accessibility. Use Lighthouse for audits.

subtasks.title: Page Load Optimization
subtasks.description: Implement best practices to reduce page load time, including minimizing HTTP requests, compressing assets, and using lazy loading for images.
subtasks.details: Review and minimize external scripts, compress images, enable lazy loading, and use priority hints for critical assets[1][3][4].

subtasks.title: Critical Rendering Path Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize the sequence of steps the browser takes to render the page by reducing file sizes, loading important content first, and using asynchronous loading for non-critical scripts.
subtasks.details: Reduce CSS/JS file sizes, inline critical CSS, defer non-critical JS, and batch DOM updates to minimize layout events[2][4].

subtasks.title: CDN Setup
subtasks.description: Configure a Content Delivery Network to distribute website assets globally, reducing latency and improving load times for users in different regions.
subtasks.details: Select a CDN provider, configure asset delivery, and ensure proper caching headers are set for static resources[3][4][5].

subtasks.title: Responsive Design Implementation
subtasks.description: Ensure the website layout adapts seamlessly to various screen sizes and devices, improving user experience and accessibility.
subtasks.details: Use media queries, flexible grids, and responsive images; test on multiple device sizes and orientations[3][5].

subtasks.title: Cross-Browser Testing
subtasks.description: Test the website across different browsers and devices to ensure consistent performance and appearance.
subtasks.details: Use automated and manual testing tools to verify compatibility and performance on major browsers and devices[5].

tasks.title: Implement Security and Compliance Features
tasks.description: Develop security and compliance features for data protection and authentication.
tasks.details: Implement end-to-end encryption for sensitive data. Ensure GDPR compliance with data export/deletion. Add multi-factor authentication and secure session management. Implement XSS protection, domain whitelist/blacklist, and URL sanitization. Use Content Security Policy headers. Conduct regular security audits.
tasks.testStrategy: Test encryption, GDPR features, and MFA. Verify XSS protection and URL sanitization. Check security headers and audit logs.

subtasks.title: Encryption Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement data encryption using best practices such as AES-256 for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for communications.
subtasks.details: Ensure proper key management and consider post-quantum cryptography for future-proofing.

subtasks.title: GDPR Compliance
subtasks.description: Ensure compliance with GDPR regulations by implementing data protection policies and procedures.
subtasks.details: Conduct a GDPR readiness assessment and implement necessary controls.

subtasks.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
subtasks.description: Implement multi-factor authentication to enhance user login security.
subtasks.details: Use a combination of methods such as passwords, biometrics, and one-time passwords.

subtasks.title: XSS Protection
subtasks.description: Protect against cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks by validating user input and using output encoding.
subtasks.details: Implement Content Security Policy (CSP) to define allowed sources of content.

subtasks.title: CSP Headers Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement Content Security Policy (CSP) headers to define allowed sources of content.
subtasks.details: Configure CSP to restrict scripts and styles to specific domains.

subtasks.title: Security Audits
subtasks.description: Conduct regular security audits to identify vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with implemented security measures.
subtasks.details: Perform audits on encryption, GDPR compliance, MFA, XSS protection, and CSP headers.

subtasks.title: Data-at-Rest Encryption
subtasks.description: Implement encryption for sensitive data stored in the database
subtasks.details: Set up database encryption keys, implement field-level encryption for sensitive data, configure encrypted backups, implement key rotation policies. Before implementation, use Context7 MCP for documentation research and Supabase MCP for database/auth setup.

subtasks.title: Data-in-Transit Encryption
subtasks.description: Implement TLS/SSL encryption for all data transmissions
subtasks.details: Configure TLS 1.3 for all connections, implement certificate management, set up HSTS headers, configure secure API endpoints. Before implementation, use Context7 MCP to get the latest documentation and best practices.

subtasks.title: Key Management System
subtasks.description: Implement secure key management and rotation system
subtasks.details: Set up key management service, implement key rotation schedules, configure key access controls, implement key backup and recovery

subtasks.title: Data Access and Portability
subtasks.description: Implement GDPR-compliant data access and portability features
subtasks.details: Create data export functionality, implement data access requests, ensure machine-readable formats, implement data verification and integrity checks. Before implementation, use Supabase MCP to check project configuration and apply necessary setup.

subtasks.title: Right to Erasure Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement complete data deletion and right to be forgotten functionality
subtasks.details: Create data deletion workflows, implement cascading deletions, handle data anonymization, implement deletion verification and audit trails

subtasks.title: Consent Management System
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive consent management for data processing
subtasks.details: Create consent forms and tracking, implement granular consent options, handle consent withdrawal, implement consent audit logging
